QuestData.Title: Continued Efforts: Scholar's Den
QuestData.Description:
We cannot allow the mawsworn a foothold so close to our own encampment. The attendants say they keep this place hidden from eyes, but I will not rest easy while I can see them.
Enter the Scholar's Den and cleanse the Jailer's forces from it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Clear the mawsworn from the Scholar's Den.
QuestData.RewardText: You have performed admirably in this task, Maw Walker. We thank you for your aid.
